alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 16 at 2:24PM MST until February 17 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as -5F for Capitol Reef National Park and the upper elevations of Zion National Park. Wind chills as low as 5 above zero for the lower elevations of Zion National Park. * WHERE...Zion National Park and Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Zion National Park
